prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with spiky purple armor and a soft aqua tail.
I want a unique Pokemon that can thrive underwater and has vibrant colors.
Generate a creature that resembles a jellyfish but has a more solid form.
Make a Pokemon that has a dual nature of both aquatic and poison characteristics.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage in coral reefs with colorful spikes.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean with a fierce appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that is small, colorful, and has distinct aquatic features.
